# [Interview #618: West Jordan Signing Report - 17th Shard, Entry #54](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=618#54)

#### Josh

Why can Sazed read minds in
*Alloy of Law*
when Ruin can't?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. Well wait, who's mind is he reading?

#### Josh

Wax's.

#### Mi'chelle

Eric argues he talks directly to Wax.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Mmmmhmmm.
